title: Crime Alert 12.07.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.07.21
description:
A 21 year old threatens to "slaughter" thousands of women. A woman wanted for questioning in a murder decides to turn herself in for the reward money.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
